00033 namespace Step {
00037     template<int N> class Binary : public std::bitset<N>
00038     {
00039 
00040     public:
00041 
00042         Binary()
00043         {
00044             m_width = N;
00045             m_fixed_width = true;
00046             m_n = !(m_width%4) ?
00047                   0 : !((m_width+1)%4)?
00048                   1 : !((m_width+2)%4) ?
00049                   2 : 3 ;
00050             m_k = m_n + m_width;
00051             m_unset = true;
00052 #ifdef __GNUG__
00053             std::bitset<N>::reset();
00054 #else
00055             reset();
00056 #endif
00057         }

00059         Binary(const Binary<N>& b)
00060                 :  m_width(b.m_width),
00061                 m_fixed_width(b.m_fixed_width),
00062                 m_k(b.m_k),
00063                 m_n(b.m_n),
00064                 m_unset(b.m_unset) {}

00066         void from_spfstring(const std::string &s)
00067         {
00068             int i,idx;
00069 
00070             m_width = N;
00071             m_fixed_width = true;
00072             m_n = !(m_width%4) ?
00073                   0 : !((m_width+1)%4)?
00074                   1 : !((m_width+2)%4) ?
00075                   2 : 3 ;
00076             m_k = m_n + m_width;
00077 
00078 #ifdef __GNUG__
00079             std::bitset<N>::reset();
00080 #else
00081             reset();
00082 #endif
00083             if (s.length()==1) {
00084                 m_unset = true;
00085             }
00086             else {
00087                 m_unset = false;
00088                 // No check done...
00089                 int t;
00090                 t = s[1]<58?s[1]-48:s[1]-55;
00091 
00092                 switch (m_n) {
00093                 case 0:
00094                     if (t&8)
00095                         this->set(0);
00096                     if (t&4)
00097                         this->set(1);
00098                     if (t&2)
00099                         this->set(2);
00100                     if (t&1)
00101                         this->set(3);
00102                     break;
00103                 case 1:
00104                     if (t&4)
00105                         this->set(0);
00106                     if (t&2)
00107                         this->set(1);
00108                     if (t&1)
00109                         this->set(2);
00110                     break;
00111                 case 2:
00112                     if (t&2)
00113                         this->set(0);
00114                     if (t&1)
00115                         this->set(1);
00116                     break;
00117                 case 3:
00118                     if (t&1)
00119                         this->set(0);
00120                     break;
00121                 }
00122                 for (i=4-m_n, idx=2; i < m_width ; i+=4,idx++)
00123                 {
00124                     t = s[idx]<58?s[idx]-48:s[idx]-55;
00125                     if (t&8)
00126                         this->set(i);
00127                     if (t&4)
00128                         this->set(i+1);
00129                     if (t&2)
00130                         this->set(i+2);
00131                     if (t&1)
00132                         this->set(i+3);
00133                 }
00134             }
00135         }
00136 
00137         std::string &to_spfstring()
00138         {
00139             int i,idx;
00140             char *t;
00141             std::string *s;
00142             if (m_unset) {
00143                 s = new std::string("0");
00144                 return *s;
00145             }
00146 #ifdef __GNUG__
00147 # define TEST std::bitset<N>::test
00148 #else
00149 # define TEST test
00150 #endif
00151             t = new char[m_k/4+1+1]; // +1 for trailing 0
00152             t[1]=0;
00153             switch (m_n) {
00154             case 0:
00155                 if (TEST(0))
00156                     t[1]+=8;
00157                 if (TEST(1))
00158                     t[1]+=4;
00159                 if (TEST(2))
00160                     t[1]+=2;
00161                 if (TEST(3))
00162                     t[1]+=1;
00163                 break;
00164             case 1:
00165                 if (TEST(0))
00166                     t[1]+=4;
00167                 if (TEST(1))
00168                     t[1]+=2;
00169                 if (TEST(2))
00170                     t[1]+=1;
00171                 break;
00172             case 2:
00173                 if (TEST(0))
00174                     t[1]+=2;
00175                 if (TEST(1))
00176                     t[1]+=1;
00177                 break;
00178             case 3:
00179                 if (TEST(0))
00180                     t[1]+=1;
00181                 break;
00182             }
00183 
00184             // Divide the sequence in into groups of 4 bits
00185             for (i=4-m_n, idx=2; i<m_width;i+=4,idx++) {
00186                 t[idx] = 0;
00187                 if (TEST(i))
00188                     t[idx]+=8;
00189                 if (TEST(i+1))
00190                     t[idx]+=4;
00191                 if (TEST(i+2))
00192                     t[idx]+=2;
00193                 if (TEST(i+3))
00194                     t[idx]+=1;
00195             }
00196 
00197 #undef TEST
00198             // Precede the sequence with the 4bit representation of m_n
00199             t[0]=m_n;
00200 
00201             // If the decimal value of a 4-bit group is <= 9 add 48
00202             // else add 55 to create the 8bit char.
00203             for (i=0; i<(m_k/4+1); i++) {
00204                 t[i] = t[i] <= 9 ? t[i]+48 : t[i]+55 ;
00205             }
00206 
00207             // set trailing char to 0 to end string
00208             t[m_k/4+1] = 0;
00209             s = new std::string(t);
00210             delete t;
00211             return *s;
00212         }
00213 
00214         int width() {
00215             return m_width;
00216         }
00217         int width() const  {
00218             return m_width;
00219         }
00220 
00221         bool fixed_width() {
00222             return m_fixed_width;
00223         }
00224         bool fixed_width() const {
00225             return m_fixed_width;
00226         }
00227 
00228         bool is_unset() {
00229             return m_unset;
00230         }

00233 
00234     private:
00235         int m_k;
00236         int m_n;
00237         int m_width;
00238         bool m_unset;
00239         bool m_fixed_width;
